enemyMoveRandom.name: move enemy random
enemyMoveRandom.description: Instantly move the enemy <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces in a random direction.

enemyMoveLeft.name: move enemy left
enemyMoveLeft.description: Instantly move the enemy <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces to the <c=keyword>LEFT</c>.

enemyMoveRight.name: move enemy right
enemyMoveRight.description: Instantly move the enemy <c=keyword>{{Amount}}</c> spaces to the <c=keyword>RIGHT</c>.

outgoingAlt.name: outgoing
outgoingAlt.description: This effect will be applied to the enemy, wherever they are.
